item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
What's New

  • Fixed microphone access so the permission prompt appears when you tap Request Access in Settings or try to record with the mic
  • Mila now shows up in System Settings under Privacy and Security, Microphone so you can enable or disable access there
  • When mic access is off, opening Settings no longer shows an empty list; the app requests access first so Mila appears in the list
  • Clearer instructions and a smoother flow for enabling the microphone
